summary: The Small Business Administration set up programs to help with the COVID-19 pandemic, including the Paycheck Protection Program. We testified about 23 recommendations we've made to improve this and other SBA programs. SBA has addressed 10 of our recommendations. For example, we recommended that it conduct a formal fraud risk assessment and develop a strategy to manage risks, and SBA has done so. However, SBA...
title: Small Business Administration: Progress and Work Remaining to Implement Key Management Improvements
